name: Resident Funny
description:
This is a sillier version of survival horror.

you can:

Survive

Talk to the killer.

Sing and dance with a zombie

Transform into a anime boy.

Get killed by the killer but never really die!

This is not to be taken seriously. This was made for no apparent reason and it is rather silly, it has some strong language.  So.... yeah.... play it.

You don't have to buy it if you don't want to.
